alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 3:56AM CDT until March 26 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Laclede County. .Heavy rainfall is expected over the Big Piney Basin tonight and Friday and will likely cause flooding at Fort Leonard Wood. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Hazelgreen. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, minor flooding begins at the gage site and mainly affects low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 3.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 3.2 feet this morning. It will then fall to 3.1 feet this evening. It will rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to 23.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
